class_notes: Section #100 is for BSN semester 1 students only.
course_description: Students are introduced to concepts for achieving/maintaining quality of life and well-being at the individual/family/group/community/population level across the lifespan. Emphasis is on health promotion and disease/injury prevention, flourishing, healthy lifestyles, and health education and literacy.
sections: Class Nbr: 3062, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 8-9:50a, Instructor: P. Moreland, Status: Open
